entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
